text: "I Believe in Love" is a 1976 song first introduced by Barbra Streisand as a B-side to her single Evergreen (Love Theme from A Star Is Born). Loggins later recorded for his debut studio album Celebrate Me Home and went to number 66 in the United States and number 45 in Canada. It was covered by Johnny Mathis for his 1984 live album Live. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Barbra Streisand songs Category:Kenny Loggins songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs
title: I Believe in Love (Kenny Loggins song)
